skillTree.localised_description: Skeletal Steeds draped in fine armour make for an impressive and dangerous sight.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Memory is too generous a term, but something inspires the skilled undead to follow this one.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -2% for Grave Guard and Black Knights units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -4% for Grave Guard and Black Knights units
	(Hero's army)

Upkeep: -8% for Grave Guard and Black Knights units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +20% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: What's left of this one's memory is little more than endless bloodshed, and they intend to continue their work.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against High Elves, Lizardmen, Dwarfs and men

skillTree.localised_description: Dig, dig, yes, my servants certainly buried me with my finest adornments.
With enough time to prepare, the Wight King emboldens the entire horde.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 1% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Physical resistance: 3% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

Physical resistance: 5% when under siege
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: So evil was this one in life that the evil bindings of the undead stiffen and strengthen around them.
Ancient baubles imbue this one with magical protections in combat.
Even the best train beast of war shudder to approach this abomination.

effects.description:
Melee defence: -2 for Cavalry units
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Rising to serve the will of their own captain, these Grave Guard sally forth.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Barrow Guardians - 60 units

skillTree.localised_description: RISE. KILL. SERVE.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Barrow Guardians

skillTree.localised_description: A new chamber unearthed, a new source of ancient weapons for our most dedicated.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Barrow Guardians

skillTree.localised_description: Scale, plate, and chainmail, left over from times forgotten, but protected from the ravages of time with powerful warding magic.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Barrow Guardians

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: What was yours is mine now.
Youâ€™ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 30% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
